amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the amount made available for "Supreme Court of the United States-Salaries and Expenses", and increasing the amount made available for "The White House-Salaries and Expenses", by $7.25.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount made available for "Supreme Court of the United States-Salaries and Expenses", and increasing the amount made available for "The White House-Salaries and Expenses", by $7.25.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A049) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Crowley.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A049) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
